"Q: I want to go to multiple days of the event. Can I buy a ticket package? 
A: There’s no multi-day ticket package available. You’ll have to purchase your tickets individually for each day."

Really Riot, really.....What about those of us who want to go with multiple people for multiple days :(
There is this crazy thing called buying multiple tickets. I hear it will allow you to go with multiple people for multiple days which fulfills your wishes completely!

How many games are in one day?

Hope that in quarter and semi finals will be bo5. Hope fnatic goes at least semifinals again, if not I'm going for finals only.

Omg just imagine the crowd there
whole studio screaming BAGUETTE BAGUETTE BAGUETTE all the time {{summoner:21}} {{summoner:6}}

I understand that this is for the group stages, but i plan on attending the quarter-finals in London. it says here that only 6 tickets can be purchased at a time, each being one seat per day. if i want to attend for 4 days in London, and want to bring a friend, i would be unable to purchase all the tickets at once. is this going to change for other events, or is this the stuck rule?

you can buy 6 tickets at a time. This is to prevent that people buy loads of tickets and sell them through. So lets say you want to go with just a friend. then you can just buy tickets per day. So you need to do the buying proces 4 times and buy 4 times 2 tickets for 4 days of lcs fun. Maybe you can combine 2 days in 1 order. Then you only have to order twice. Hope you understand :D
buy 2 tickets at once for each day to make sure you can buy them all and be aside your friend

Me and my friends plan to go to the finals in Berlin. I really hope the live commentary will be in English.

I think it is stupid to use Ticketmaster to sell tickets as they are notorious for backend deals with other companies. They sell a very few amount to the public and sell the rest of tickets to other companies who sell them back to the public at 2x or even three times their value or more. When people buy tickets 3 minutes later it's sold out, and then they check other websites and they already up their at 3x the value of the original ticket. Use another ticket service!!!

Because October 1 is starting at 2pm and October 11 at 10 am ...
As you can see, Oct 11th is a sunday, therefore some visitors have to work on monday and thats why the group stage starts earlier on this day.
